film.name: The Godfather
film.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son

film.name: Forrest Gump
film.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart

film.name: The Shawshank Redemption
film.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency

film.name: Pulp Fiction
film.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption

film.name: Inception
film.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O

film.name: Matrix
film.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

film.name: The Silence of the Lambs
film.description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims

film.name: The Green Mile
film.description: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

film.name: The Pianist
film.description: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II

film.name: American History X
film.description: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did

film.name: Intouchables
film.description: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver

film.name: Joker
film.description: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker

film.name: La vita e bella
film.description: When an open-minded Jewish librarian and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor, and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp

film.name: Fight Club
film.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more

film.name: Schindlers List
film.description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis

film.name: 12 Angry Men
film.description: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

film.name: Its a Wonderful Life
film.description: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed

film.name: Once Upon a Time İn America
film.description: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan over thirty years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life

film.name: Requiem for a Dream
film.description: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

film.name: Dangal
film.description: Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat and his two wrestler daughters struggle towards glory at the Commonwealth Games in the face of societal oppression.
